1.name: GUMMIDIPUNDI
1.description: A northern gateway constituency of Tamil Nadu in Tiruvallur district, known for its major industrial estates.

2.name: PONNERI
2.description: A reserved constituency in Tiruvallur district, home to the historic Ponneri town and coastal salt pans.

3.name: TIRUTTANI
3.description: Famous for the ancient Arulmigu Subramanya Swamy Temple, one of the six abodes of Lord Murugan.

4.name: THIRUVALLUR
4.description: The administrative headquarters of Tiruvallur district, known for the historic Sri Veeraraghava Swamy Temple.

5.name: POONAMALLEE
5.description: A historic town and major transport hub in the western suburbs of Chennai, serving as a vital commercial center.

6.name: AVADI
6.description: Home to heavy industrial units including the Heavy Vehicles Factory and significant Indian Army establishments.

7.name: MADURAVOYAL
7.description: A rapidly developing residential suburb in West Chennai located along the arterial Chennai-Bangalore Highway.

8.name: AMBATTUR
8.description: One of the largest industrial hubs in South Asia, known for its extensive IT parks and manufacturing units.

9.name: MADAVARAM
9.description: A northern residential suburb of Chennai, famous for its large botanical garden and milk dairy processing unit.

10.name: THIRUVOTTIYUR
10.description: An ancient coastal town in North Chennai, home to the historic Thyagaraja Swamy Temple and industrial units.

11.description: A high-profile constituency in North Chennai, historically significant for being the seat of prominent political leaders.

12.name: PERAMBUR

13.name: KOLATHUR

14.name: VILLIVAKKAM

16.name: EGMORE

17.name: ROYAPURAM

19.name: CHEPAUK-THIRUVALLIKENI

208.name: TIRUCHULI

209.name: PARAMAKUDI
209.description: The headquarters of Ramanathapuram district, a historic town serving as the gateway to Rameswaram.

210.name: TIRUVADANAI
210.description: A reserved constituency in Ramanathapuram district, primarily dependent on coastal agriculture and fishing.

211.name: RAMANATHAPURAM
211.description: A coastal constituency in Ramanathapuram district, known for its fishing industry and palm-based crafts.

212.name: MUDUKULATHUR
212.description: A historic coastal town and major pilgrimage site, home to the Ramanathaswamy Temple and Pamban Bridge.

213.name: VILATHIKULAM
213.description: A reserved constituency in Thoothukudi district, primarily focused on agriculture and rural development.

214.name: THOOTHUKKUDI
214.description: Known as the 'Pearl City,' it is a major port city famous for its pearl fishing and thermal power plants.

215.name: TIRUCHENDUR
215.description: A coastal constituency in Thoothukudi district, home to the famous Tiruchendur Murugan Temple by the sea.

216.name: SRIVAIKUNTAM
216.description: A rural constituency in Thoothukudi district, primarily dependent on dry-land agriculture and salt pans.

217.name: OTTAPIDARAM
217.description: Known as the birthplace of the great Tamil poet Subramania Bharati and the historic Ettayapuram palace.

218.name: KOVILPATTI
218.description: The headquarters of Tenkasi district, famous for the Kasi Viswanathar Temple and its scenic beauty.

219.name: SANKARANKOVIL
219.description: Famous for the Courtallam waterfalls, often called the 'Spa of South India,' and its lush greenery.

220.name: VASUDEVANALLUR
220.description: A reserved constituency in Tenkasi district, primarily dependent on agriculture and rural crafts.

221.name: KADAYANALLUR
221.description: A historic town in Tenkasi district, known for the ancient Nellaiappar Temple and agricultural heritage.

222.name: TENKASI
222.description: The headquarters of Tirunelveli district, famous for its ancient temples and the local 'Halwa' delicacy.

223.name: ALANGULAM
223.description: A rapidly developing urban area in Tirunelveli, home to many educational institutions and IT parks.

224.name: TIRUNELVELI
224.description: Famous for the ISRO Propulsion Complex and its proximity to the scenic Western Ghats.

225.name: AMBASAMUDRAM
225.description: A rural constituency in Tirunelveli district, primarily focused on agriculture and small industries.

226.name: PALAYAMCOTTAI
226.description: A coastal constituency in Tirunelveli district, known for its significant fishing industry and renewable energy projects.

227.name: NANGUNERI
227.description: A major trade center in Tirunelveli district, known for its vibrant agricultural and cattle markets.

228.name: RADHAPURAM
228.description: The headquarters of Kanniyakumari district, world-famous for its sunrise and sunset at the tip of India.

229.name: KANNIYAKUMARI
229.description: A coastal constituency in Kanniyakumari district, known for its salt pans and significant fishing harbor.

230.name: NAGERCOIL
230.description: The administrative heart of Kanniyakumari district, a major commercial hub and educational center.

231.name: COLACHEL
231.description: A coastal town in Kanniyakumari district, known for its significant history and fishing industry.

232.name: PADMANABHAPURAM
232.description: Historically the capital of the Travancore Kingdom, known for its magnificent wooden palace.

233.name: VILAVANCODE
233.description: A coastal constituency in Kanniyakumari district, known for its high literacy rate and rubber plantations.

234.name: KILLIYOOR
234.description: A coastal constituency in Kanniyakumari district, primarily dependent on fishing and coconut cultivation.
